name: 2023 IEEE Power and Energy Society General Meeting
content: The 2023 meeting will be held 16-20 July 2023 in Orlando, Florida. This premier power engineering conference, with the theme of Meeting the Energy Needs of a Dynamic World, will bring together practicing power engineers and academics from all over the world to promote, share, and discuss various issues and developments in the field of electrical power engineering. Topics of interest include but arenâ€™t restricted to, transmission advancement for decarbonization, communications & cyber security, novel approaches & emerging technologies to support system operation, and integration of DERs, EVs, and BTM resources. Submit your papers by 8 November 2022 to be considered. Learn more about the submission process and paper guidelines here: https://pes-gm.org/call-for-papers/
